title: Shatterglass
description: Tris is one of the most powerful mages ever born, with lightning magic flowing through her veins. When a series of brutal stranglings desecrate the fragile peace of Tharios, Tris is infuriated by the the city-fathers. No one seems to care about the dead girls. But Tris knows she has to keep hold of her magic - she can't let anger take her over.So when she feels a mage pulling all the power in the neighbourhood into his working, Tris is deeply disturbed. That mage, Keth, is completely unaware of his magic. Tris is sure he could help her find the killer, but can she and Keth unravel his powers in time?
author: Tamora Pierce
